Blinken urges Bosnia MPs to push through law to build gas pipeline with Croatia -mediaU.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken has urged Bosnian Croat lawmakers to stop holding up legislation to build a natural gas pipeline with Croatia, seen as an alternative to Russian gas, local media reported on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 17:07:53 GMT MACNFBERBFJKFPWJUI6LWHCXRY https://www.reuters.com/world/us/blinken-urges-bosnia-mps-push-through-law-build-gas-pipeline-with-croatia-media-2024-01-18/Reuters世界美国
Russian-annexed Crimea restores power after brief blackout - officialsParts of Russian-annexed Crimea were briefly left without electricity on Thursday evening but the Russian energy ministry said power was later restored. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 17:07:17 GMT CM5GPHM44RJDDEM5TV37GRJTA4 https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-annexed-crimea-restores-power-after-brief-blackout-officials-2024-01-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Quebec leader urges Trudeau to stem refugee inflow as services near 'breaking point'Quebec Premier Francois Legault urged Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau to stem the flow of refugees into the province and to compensate it for costs, claiming Quebec's services were close to a "breaking point" due to the rising number. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 16:46:38 GMT KYRWIAJDP5JBFMJASXEBFKJV6M https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/quebec-leader-urges-trudeau-stem-refugee-inflow-services-near-writing-point-2024-01-18/Steve Scherer, Ismail Shakil世界美洲
Polish top court rejects government plan to overhaul public mediaA top Polish court rejected as illegal on Thursday plans to liquidate the country's state radio, television and news agency which the new pro-EU coalition government said had become propaganda outlets for the previous right-wing administration. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 16:38:34 GMT C6P6YOI6KRM45LX47DZLWZNNYU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-top-court-rejects-government-plan-overhaul-public-media-2024-01-18/Anna Wlodarczak-Semczuk世界欧洲
Ukraine working 'intensively' to restore air travelUkraine is working "intensively" with partners to restore air travel suspended for nearly two years, with the main focus on Boryspil International Airport outside the capital Kyiv, a presidential official said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 16:18:16 GMT 5I5GEZEGZNP2BGSLILV4PUQI6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-working-intensely-restore-air-travel-2024-01-18/Reuters商业达沃斯
Top US diplomat Blinken to discuss security challenges during West Africa trip next weekSecurity challenges in West Africa following the coup in Niger last year will be among key topics U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken will discuss with African leaders next week during his trip to the region, the State Department's top Africa diplomat said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 16:13:53 GMT LU7VSWCOQRL4HJUA6HAYZU45SQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us/top-us-diplomat-blinken-discuss-security-challenges-during-west-africa-trip-next-2024-01-18/Daphne Psaledakis, Humeyra Pamuk世界美国
Brazil's Lula to meet Chinese foreign minister on FridayBrazil's President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva will meet with China's visiting Foreign Minister Wang Yi on Friday afternoon in the northeastern Brazilian city of Fortaleza, a presidential spokesperson said on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 15:36:49 GMT LCFZRLKT2ZKVPKAOPUMGJBPHLA https://www.reuters.com/world/brazils-lula-meet-chinese-foreign-minister-friday-2024-01-18/Reuters世界
Germany to develop short-range air defence system to replace retired Gepard tanksGermany will order the development of a short-range air defence system for some 1.3 billion euros ($1.4 billion) to plug a gap in its defences that became apparent after Moscow's invasion of Ukraine and replace its long-retired Gepard tanks among other equipment. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 15:34:22 GMT YRQ7IVYPONK5VCHBBVFKZX6PEA https://www.reuters.com/business/aerospace-defense/germany-develop-short-range-air-defence-system-replace-retired-gepard-tanks-2024-01-18/Reuters商业航空航天与国防
At least 12 children, two teachers drown in Indian lake after pleasure boat capsizesAt least 12 children and their two teachers drowned in India on Thursday when a boat on which they were riding during a picnic capsized, officials said. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 15:31:01 GMT OF7JJ5S47ZM5TLPBY5JTNSXZ7Q https://www.reuters.com/world/india/least-12-children-two-teachers-drown-indian-lake-after-pleasure-boat-capsizes-2024-01-18/Sumit Khanna世界印度
NATO to hold biggest drills since Cold War with 90,000 troopsNATO is launching its largest exercise since the Cold War, rehearsing how U.S. troops could reinforce European allies in countries bordering Russia and on the alliance's eastern flank if a conflict were to flare up with a "near-peer" adversary. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 14:39:05 GMT 5ASWB25TARJTXGXVD3DTKPOO6Y https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/nato-kick-off-biggest-drills-decades-with-some-90000-troops-2024-01-18/Reuters世界欧洲
Exclusive: Saudi Arabia still considering BRICS membership, sources saySaudi Arabia is still considering an invitation to become a member of the BRICS bloc of countries after being asked to join by the grouping last year, two sources with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters on Thursday. Thu, 18 Jan 2024 13:48:54 GMT IFZJFKFFLJP4JIRAO5GOT6D4UU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/saudi-arabia-considering-brics-membership-sources-2024-01-18/Maha Dahan, Dmitry Zhdannikov商业达沃斯
